steps.name: Given  I am on the vehicle appointment booking page
Navigated to appointment booking page
And  I have switched the language to English
Language switched to English
When  I click the "Make Appointment" button
Clicked button: Make Appointment
And  I select "Serie Normale" option
Selected option: Serie Normale
And  I click the "Next" button
Clicked button: Next
And  I fill vehicle identification form with valid data
Vehicle identification form filled with valid data

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: Vehicle identification form filled with valid data

steps.name: And  I click the "Next" button
Clicked button: Next
And  I select "Multiple Services" option
Selected option: Multiple Services
Then  the multiple services form should be displayed
Multiple services form verified as displayed

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: Multiple services form verified as displayed
